snippet.name: 1st_derivative
snippet.function:
if (is_first) then is_first = false prevX = time prevY = value end
dx = time - prevX dy = value - prevY prevX = time prevY = value
return dy/dx

snippet.name: integral
snippet.function:
if (is_first) then is_first = false prevX = time end
dx = time - prevX prevX = time
integral = integral + value*dx
return integral

snippet.name: remove_offset
snippet.function:
if (is_first) then is_first = false first_value = value end
return value - first_value

snippet.name: quat_to_roll
snippet.function:
w = value x = v1 y = v2 z = v3
dcm21 = 2 * (w * x + y * z) dcm22 = w*w - x*x - y*y + z*z
roll = math.atan(dcm21, dcm22)
return roll

snippet.name: quat_to_pitch
snippet.function:
w = value x = v1 y = v2 z = v3
dcm20 = 2 * (x * z - w * y)
pitch = math.asin(-dcm20)
return pitch

snippet.name: quat_to_yaw
snippet.function:
w = value x = v1 y = v2 z = v3
dcm10 = 2 * (x * y + w * z) dcm00 = w*w + x*x - y*y - z*z
yaw = math.atan(dcm10, dcm00)
return yaw
